FILE(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin)
IF (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
   FILE (COPY lib/Debug/v8.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
   FILE (COPY lib/Debug/icui18n.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
   FILE (COPY lib/Debug/icuuc.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
   FILE (COPY lib/Debug/icudt.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
ELSE (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
   FILE (COPY lib/Release/v8.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
   FILE (COPY lib/Release/icui18n.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
   FILE (COPY lib/Release/icuuc.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
   FILE (COPY lib/Release/icudt.dll DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
ENDIF (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
